    Hex-binned entropy map on embeddings

    VisHexEntropy.Rd

    Compute per-bin Shannon entropy of group composition on UMAP/PCA and visualize as a tile heatmap.

    Usage

    VisHexEntropy(
  object,
  group.by = "seurat_clusters",
  reduction = "umap",
  bins = 30
)

    Arguments

    object

    A Seurat object.

    group.by

    Metadata column for groups.

    reduction

    Reduction name, default 'umap'.

    bins

    Number of bins per axis.

    Value

    A ggplot heatmap of entropy.

    Examples

    obj <- SeuratVisProExample(n_cells = 300, n_genes = 800, n_clusters = 3)
#> Modularity Optimizer version 1.3.0 by Ludo Waltman and Nees Jan van Eck
#> 
#> Number of nodes: 300
#> Number of edges: 12023
#> 
#> Running Louvain algorithm...
#> Maximum modularity in 10 random starts: 0.8321
#> Number of communities: 3
#> Elapsed time: 0 seconds
p <- VisHexEntropy(obj, group.by = 'seurat_clusters', bins = 30)
p
